Alchemy: Effect.name: Alchemy: Effect
Alchemy: Effect.description: When you create a mix, roll the amount of twenty-sided dice indicated by that mix, then assign one of those rolls to the @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.rollable-tables.RollTable.vZa3GMOzrEVma2Hv]{target} table and one to the effect table (below). Discard all remaining dice, then describe the effects of the mix!

results.1-1: ... treats their Dexterity (@EFFECT[dex-up e:eot i:2 t:source]) and Might (@EFFECT[mig-up e:eot i:2 t:source]) dice as if they were one size higher (up to a maximum of d12) until the end of your next turn.
results.2-2: ... treats their Insight (@EFFECT[ins-up e:eot i:2 t:source]) and Willpower (@EFFECT[wlp-up e:eot i:2 t:source]) dice as if they were one size higher (up to a maximum of d12) until the end of your next turn.
results.3-3: ... suffers @DMG[20 air] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 air] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 air] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
results.4-4: ... suffers @DMG[20 bolt] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 bolt] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 bolt] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
results.5-5: ... suffers @DMG[20 dark] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 dark] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 dark] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
results.6-6: ... suffers @DMG[20 earth] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 earth] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 earth] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
results.7-7: ... suffers @DMG[20 fire] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 fire] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 fire] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
results.8-8: ... suffers @DMG[20 ice] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 ice] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 ice] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
results.9-9: ... gains Resistance to air (@TYPE[affinity air resistance e:eos i:1 t:source]) and fire (@TYPE[affinity fire resistance e:eos i:1 t:source]) damage until the end of the scene.
results.10-10: ... gains Resistance to bolt (@TYPE[affinity bolt resistance e:eos i:1 t:source]) and ice (@TYPE[affinity ice resistance e:eos i:1 t:source]) damage until the end of the scene.
results.11-11: ... gains Resistance to dark (@TYPE[affinity dark resistance e:eos i:1 t:source]) and earth (@TYPE[affinity earth resistance e:eos i:1 t:source]) damage until the end of the scene.

Alchemy: Target.name: Alchemy: Target
Alchemy: Target.description: When you create a mix, roll the amount of twenty-sided dice indicated by that mix, then assign one of those rolls to the target table (below) and one to the effect table @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.rollable-tables.RollTable.TvH7gOE0xQYeimUF]{Alchemy: Effect}. Discard all remaining dice, then describe the effects of the mix!

results.1-6: ... you or one ally you can see that is present on the scene.
results.7-11: ... one enemy you can see that is present on the scene.
results.12-16: ... you and every ally present on the scene.
results.17-20: ... every enemy present on the scene.

Delicacy Effect.name: Delicacy Effect
Delicacy Effect.description: When you combine two tastes you never combined before, determine the effect of that combination by rolling a d12; most entries also require you to make a choice (such as a specific damage type or status effect). Once you're done, record the resulting effect on your @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.HQTDIy6suF8u6dAl]{Cookbook}: from this moment on, that combination of tastes will always produce that exact effect when you use it. Follow @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.vsXmQQBeh7FSTCc4]{Ingredients & Delicacies Rules} for more instructions.

results.1-1: Each of this delicacy's targets recovers from the (choose one: dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, weak) status effect.
results.2-2: Each of this delicacy's targets suffers the (choose one: @EFFECT[dazed]; @EFFECT[shaken]; @EFFECT[slow]; @EFFECT[weak]) status effect
results.3-3: Each of this delicacy's targets recovers @GAIN[40 hp]. This amount increases to @GAIN[50 hp] if you are level 30 or higher.
results.4-4: Each of this delicacy's targets recovers @GAIN[40 mp]. This amount increases to @GAIN[50 mp] if you are level 30 or higher.
results.5-5: Each of this delicacy's targets suffers @DMG[20 untyped] (choose one: air; bolt; earth; fire; ice; poison) damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 untyped] damage if you are level 30 or higher.
results.6-6: Until the end of your next turn, every source that deals (choose one: air; bolt; earth; fire; ice; poison) damage deals 5 extra damage to each of this delicacy's targets
results.7-7: Each of this delicacy's targets cannot perform the Guard action during their next turn
results.8-8: Each of this delicacy's targets cannot perform the Spell action during their next turn.
results.9-9: Each of this delicacy's targets cannot perform the Skill action during their next turn.
results.10-10: Each of this delicacy's targets gains Resistance to (choose one: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.3tMyw1mCjd7SfGTD]{Air}; @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.QrEztsujMpK33cpj]{Bolt}; @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.H3SJ1fej3GSyHdKG]{Earth}; @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.FAfKTXxluiqIVP5t]{Fire}; @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.SWdZeuJTEq1ig6S8]{Ice}; @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.3xPA7x9S3fggYHkX]{Poison}) damage until the end of your next turn.
results.11-11: Each of this delicacy's targets treats their (choose one: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.vv2cqUDHaCJLmEYw]{Dexterity}; @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.4G5iaieFDwGiIVrw]{Insight}; @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.hX70STpGG5fgAAkp]{Might}; @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.nXxz7GyqeIGtQpMG]{Willpower}) as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12) until the end of your next turn.
results.12-12: During the next turn of each of this delicacy's targets, all damage they deal becomes (choose one: air; bolt; earth; fire; ice; poison) and its type cannot change.

Gamble.name: Gamble
Gamble.description: You summon a vortex of chaotic energy. Roll your current Willpower die once for every 10 Mind Points spent while casting this spell, then keep the single die you prefer: the number on that die determines the effects of this spell.

results.1-1: You lose half of your current Hit Points (@LOSS[(@actor.resources.hp.value/2){Half Current HP}) and half of your current Mind Points (@LOSS[(@actor.resources.mp.value/2) mp]).
results.2-3: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers @EFFECT[poisoned].
results.4-6: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers @EFFECT[slow].
results.7-8: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers @GAIN[50 hp] and also recovers from all status effects.
results.9-12: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 damage. The damage type is determined randomly by rolling a d6: 1. @DMG[30 air] 2. @DMG[30 bolt] 3. @DMG[30 dark] 4. @DMG[30 earth] 5. @DMG[30 fire] 6. @DMG[30 poison]

Ingredient Taste.name: Ingredient Taste
Ingredient Taste.description: Roll a d6 to determine the ingredient’s taste using the table below, then describe its appearance and give it a name.
